shortDescription: Explore the canals of Venice, immerse in Italian cuisine, and enjoy a classic gondola ride on the Grand Canal.
detailedDescription: This package provides a deep dive into Venetian culture and history, perfect for couples, honeymooners, or anyone seeking a blend of romance and art. From St. Mark’s Basilica to hidden alleyway eateries, you’ll experience the authentic Venetian lifestyle.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Venice
activities: Transfer from airport to hotel on a private water taxi
Check-in at a waterfront hotel overlooking the Grand Canal
Evening stroll around Piazza San Marco

itinerary.title: Gondola Ride & Classic Venice
activities: Morning gondola ride along hidden canals
Visit the Doge’s Palace & Bridge of Sighs
Enjoy a welcome dinner at a traditional ristorante

itinerary.title: Art & Architecture
activities: Guided tour of St. Mark’s Basilica
Leisure evening: wine tasting at a local bacaro

itinerary.title: Island Hopping
activities: Boat excursion to Murano (glass-blowing demos) & Burano (colorful houses)
Lunch featuring seafood specialties in Torcello

bestTimeToVisit: April to June or September to October
notes: Peak season prices may vary. Optional tours available upon request.

faqs.question: How do I get from the airport to Venice?
faqs.answer: We include water taxi transfers, so once you land, our representative will guide you to the dock.

faqs.question: Are gondola rides included?
faqs.answer: One gondola ride (shared or private) is included on Day 2; additional rides can be booked as extras.

shortDescription: Immerse in Seoul’s modern pop culture, historical palaces, and tantalizing street food for a truly unforgettable trip.
detailedDescription: From K-pop fever to the serene temples, Seoul offers a unique fusion of tradition and cutting-edge trends. This package suits travelers eager to explore South Korea’s vibrant cityscape, taste local street food, and dive into cultural experiences like hanbok dress-up and tea ceremonies.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Night Market Tour
activities: Evening street food crawl at Gwangjang Market

itinerary.title: DMZ Excursion (Optional)
activities: Day tour to the Demilitarized Zone (optional add-on)

itinerary.title: Temple & Healing Day
activities: Relax at a traditional jjimjilbang (Korean spa)
Evening: watch a non-verbal performance (Nanta Show or similar)

inclusions: Local city tours & tickets as per itinerary
notes: Concert tickets are not included by default but can be requested. Weather may vary in spring/fall.

faqs.question: Is the DMZ tour included?
faqs.answer: No, it's an optional add-on. Please request in advance due to limited availability.

faqs.question: Can I get vegetarian meals?
faqs.answer: Yes, many Korean dishes can be vegetarian. Inform us of dietary needs before travel.

shortDescription: Sun-kissed beaches, lush rice terraces, and Balinese cultural wonders await in this perfect getaway.
detailedDescription: Experience the best of Bali, from the tranquil temples of Ubud to the vibrant nightlife of Seminyak. Whether you’re looking to surf, relax by the beach, or explore traditional art markets, this package caters to all traveler types. Enjoy daily spa sessions, mouthwatering cuisine, and mesmerizing sunsets.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Kuta Beach Sunset
activities: Airport pickup & transfer to Kuta hotel
Relax on the sandy shores of Kuta Beach
Sunset cocktail at a beachfront bar

itinerary.title: Mount Batur Sunrise (Optional)
activities: Early morning hike up Mount Batur

itinerary.title: Tanah Lot & Rice Terraces
activities: Photo stop at Tanah Lot temple
Coffee tasting at a local plantation

itinerary.title: Free Day for Leisure
activities: Relax by the beach or pool

itinerary.title: Departure
activities: Transfer to Ngurah Rai International Airport

inclusions: One full-day temple tour with a guide
notes: Mount Batur trek requires moderate fitness. Some water activities may depend on weather.

faqs.question: Is surfing included?
faqs.answer: Surf lessons can be arranged at an additional cost. Some beaches are beginner-friendly.

faqs.question: Can I extend my stay in Seminyak?
faqs.answer: Yes, additional nights can be booked upon request, subject to hotel availability.
